summary: Adds a huge dungeon with new spells, weapons, staff, potions, gems & a new Player Home.
descriptionHtml:
Dungeons : Crystal Forest
By Lord Dagobert
August 2012


[youtube]Om5ZCziEA4I[/youtube]
[youtube]Pz2OSygo8BA[/youtube]

This mod adds:
-1 Huge dungeon, divided in 7 cells, interior or exterior

-21 Bosses (check at the end for the list). 20 of them will respawn after some time.
Each boss will drop fragments of Eternity, which will allow you to craft brand new items
and spells! They will randomly drop on bosses

-A new player home, the Prowler\'s Den

-8 new weapons : Crystal Warchammer, War Axe, Sword, Mace, Greatsword, Dagger, Bow & 
Battle Axe. Improve them for 1 fragment!

-4 magic staffs (10 fragments each) : Call Ancient Familiar, Eternal Firebolt,
Crystallized Spear & Mighty Thunderbolt

-3 new potions (1 fragment for 4): Crystallized Health, Magicka and Stamina!

-11 new spells (5 fragments each): Eternal Blizzard, Divine Telekynesis, Eternal Paralysis,
Wall of Storms, Summon Eternal Priest, Life Drain, Eternal Storm, Divine Invisibility,
Eternal Healing, Crystal Storm & Chain of Storms. They will also randomly drop on some
bosses.

-Find the 5 hidden chests in the dungeon to create a new artifact, the Mask of Eternity
(heavy or light version). You can improve it for 2 fragments.

-The Eternal Soulgem, a reusable soulgem! (5 fragments)

-Random Loots

-Epic Fights



Bosses & Cells :


Path of Eternity (1st cell, exterior)
-Keeper of Eternity
-Warden Helvard


Mythic Rivers (2nd cell, exterior)
-Crystal Crab
-Crystal Fangs
-Mighty Giant


Prowler\'s Den (3rd cell, exterior)
-The Prowler


Ancient Grove (4th cell, interior)
-Black Claws
-Fallen Queen
-Mother of the Grove
-Warden Darver


Lost Paradise (5th cell, exterior)
-Frozen Worm
-Lost Wraith
-Frozen Troll
-Frozen Giant
-Frozen Matriarch
-Frozen Lord


Elder\'s Sanctuary (6th cell, interior)
-Elder Runindel
-Eternal Arachnid
-Ancient Dragonborn


Eternal Realm (7th cell, interior)
-Frostfire Hound
-Volstag, Lord of Eternity


If you ecounter a bug, a problem or you just have a question,
send me a message! I\'ll be happy to help you :) .
author: Lord Dagobert
